verbs.description: Mark Taylor , [ARG1: the firefighter] [V: turned] [ARG2: crackpot] , con artist or both , has yet another bizarre conspiracy theory . He says “ they ” ( the ubiquitous They , who are everywhere and nowhere simultaneously ) will use secret technology to create hurricanes to keep Trump voters from the polls in November ’s midterm elections . “ Look for some stuff right before the election , ” Taylor …
